user_query: I'm interested in learning about the different categories of sunnah fasting. Could you provide me with a list of categories and their descriptions? Additionally, I would like to explore the types of fasting within each category. Can you give me a list of types for each category?

TaskList.description: Gather information on the categories of sunnah fasting and their descriptions.
Compile a list of types of fasting within each of the identified categories.
